MESSAGE.JP: を、想いを語っていたクドがついたうそ。
MESSAGE.EN: She told me such a lie, even though she had told me what her dream was over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told me such a lie, even though she had told me what her dream was over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
んな結果、そんな現実は、まるで、誰かから――。
MESSAGE.EN: That kind of result, that kind of reality... it's like someone is telling me,
MESSAGE.Translation: That kind of result, that kind of reality... it's like someone is telling me,

MESSAGE.JP: ―おまえは自分以外の必要のないものを踏みつぶして生きろ、と言われているようで。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Step on whatever you need to achieve your goals... even if those things are important or valuable to others..❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Step on whatever you need to achieve your goals... even if those things are important or valuable to others..❜

MESSAGE.JP: れが、苦しかった。
うして、上手くいかないんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did things turn out like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did things turn out like this?

MESSAGE.JP: たちはそんなに大それたことを願っているわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: We weren't even wishing for anything crazy.
MESSAGE.Translation: We weren't even wishing for anything crazy.

MESSAGE.JP: さやかで、ちっぽけな夢が叶うことを祈っている。
MESSAGE.EN: All we were doing was praying for our tiny, modest dreams to come true.
MESSAGE.Translation: All we were doing was praying for our tiny, modest dreams to come true.

MESSAGE.JP: れなのに、だからこそ、ちょっとしたことでその祈りは砕かれてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: And yet, it is precisely because of that that our dreams are dashed by the most trifling things.
MESSAGE.Translation: And yet, it is precisely because of that that our dreams are dashed by the most trifling things.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（砕いたのは…）
だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The one who has been crushing their dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one who has been crushing their dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: との願いを、祈りを、僕は知らずに砕いていたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm probably crushing people's wishes and dreams without even realizing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm probably crushing people's wishes and dreams without even realizing it.

MESSAGE.JP: かの望みを。
かの祈りを。
かの希望を…自分以外の誰かが、砕き、踏みつぶす。
MESSAGE.EN: Their hopes... I'm destroying theirs to further mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their hopes... I'm destroying theirs to further mine.

MESSAGE.JP: ドに嘘をつかせてまで…僕は、クドに…何を望んでいたのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What is it I wanted... so bad... that I drove Kud to lie to me?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it I wanted... so bad... that I drove Kud to lie to me?

MESSAGE.JP: ケットの中のドッグタグを握る。
MESSAGE.EN: I grasped the dog tag in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grasped the dog tag in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: てちゃだめ、と僕は言ってあげたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to tell her not to throw this away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to tell her not to throw this away.

MESSAGE.JP: も、それを捨てたあとのクドは違う道を選ぼうとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: But she had chosen a different path by throwing it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she had chosen a different path by throwing it out.

MESSAGE.JP: れもまた、認めてあげるべきじゃないだろうか。
理樹@（…違う。それは違う。何か違う…）
う違うかうまく言葉にできないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Something was wrong, but I couldn't put it in words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something was wrong, but I couldn't put it in words.

MESSAGE.JP: は首を振った。
学旅行の冊子が配られるのも近いらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the pamphlet for the field trip was to be handed out soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the pamphlet for the field trip was to be handed out soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 備すら楽しいはずなのに身が入らないのはどうしてだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't able to get into it, even though just preparing for the trip should have been fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't able to get into it, even though just preparing for the trip should have been fun.

MESSAGE.JP: も変わっていない。
クドの笑顔が失われた以外は。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Except that Kud had lost her smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Except that Kud had lost her smile.

MESSAGE.JP: も、変わって、いない。
みの日。
ンチに座って手のひらのドッグタグと機械部品を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sitting on a bench and staring at the dog tag and machine part in my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sitting on a bench and staring at the dog tag and machine part in my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド？」
界の先をクドが横切った気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt Kud pass through my line of sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt Kud pass through my line of sight.

MESSAGE.JP: まり見たことがないクドの私服姿。
MESSAGE.EN: She was wearing her street clothes, which I didn't see very often.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was wearing her street clothes, which I didn't see very often.

MESSAGE.JP: 門に向かっているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be headed for the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be headed for the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: 意に不安がこみあげてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was suddenly struck with a sense of unease.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was suddenly struck with a sense of unease.

MESSAGE.JP: こからか来る不安。
かが遠くへ行ってしまうという恐れにも似た…不安。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a lot like the feeling you get when something is going somewhere far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a lot like the feeling you get when something is going somewhere far away.

MESSAGE.JP: はクドを呼び止めようとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to call out to her to stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to call out to her to stop.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの後ろ姿はすぐ消えた。
ールを送る。
ドからの返事はこない。
話を掛けた。
繋がらない。
理樹@「クド…」
安は強くなってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: My sense of unease was getting stronger.
MESSAGE.Translation: My sense of unease was getting stronger.

MESSAGE.JP: 話が繋がらないこと。
い不安を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: That made me feel very uneasy.
MESSAGE.Translation: That made me feel very uneasy.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてかはわからない。ただ、胸騒ぎがした。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know why. Just that I had a bad feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know why. Just that I had a bad feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: ッグタグと機械部品を掴んだまま、僕は走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I gripped the dog tag and machine part and started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gripped the dog tag and machine part and started running.

MESSAGE.JP: 門の前に、クドは立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was standing in front of the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was standing in front of the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: 服姿だけど、その亜麻色髪は見間違いようがない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was in street clothes, but there was no mistaking that flax colored hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was in street clothes, but there was no mistaking that flax colored hair.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドっ」
クド@「…どうかしましたか、リキ」
理樹@「はぁ…はぁ…それは…こっちの、台詞だよ」
理樹@「クド、電話…掛けようと、思ったんだけど」
理樹@「繋がらなくて…どうかしたの？」
クド@「すみません、リキ」
クド@「携帯、もう解約してしまったので」
理樹@「…どうして？」
るり、とクドが振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She spun around to face me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spun around to face me.

MESSAGE.JP: と機械の油で汚れたような帽子とマント。
れを身につけているクドは、どこか無表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hat and cloak were covered with mud and machine oil.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hat and cloak were covered with mud and machine oil.

MESSAGE.JP: 笑んでいるような、いや、微笑んでいないような。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be smiling and not at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be smiling and not at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「特に理由はありません。なんとなく、です」
理樹@「…クド」
理樹@「帽子…どうして汚れてるの？」
っと他に言いたいことがあったのに、僕が口にしたのはどうでもいいことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were things I'd rather have said, but what came out of my mouth was trivial.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were things I'd rather have said, but what came out of my mouth was trivial.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…それはですね…」
瞬言いよどむクド。
クド@「…おかあさんの使い古しだからです」
クド@「軍の正式帽なんです、これ」
クド@「汚れているマントと帽子は…最初におかあさんが私にくれたもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The first things that I got from Mother were the hat and cloak... and they were dirty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The first things that I got from Mother were the hat and cloak... and they were dirty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…だから、汚れたままにしてあるのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...That's why I kept them that way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...That's why I kept them that way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんの苦労が染みついているので…洗いたくなかったんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They're stained with Mother's hard work... so I didn't want to wash them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They're stained with Mother's hard work... so I didn't want to wash them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ントが風にばたばたとはためいている。
MESSAGE.EN: The cloak was fluttering in the wind.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cloak was fluttering in the wind.

MESSAGE.JP: 安はますます濃くなっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: My unease was getting steadily deeper.
MESSAGE.Translation: My unease was getting steadily deeper.

MESSAGE.JP: 黙が落ちた。
ドはどこか遠くを見ているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud seemed to be looking somewhere far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud seemed to be looking somewhere far away.

MESSAGE.JP: が見えていない何かを、クドはじっと見つめているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Like she was staring at something that I couldn't see.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like she was staring at something that I couldn't see.

MESSAGE.JP: ばを飲み込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I swallowed the saliva in my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I swallowed the saliva in my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: わず手をぎゅっと握った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was unconsciously squeezing my hand tight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was unconsciously squeezing my hand tight.

MESSAGE.JP: のひらのものを認識する。
MESSAGE.EN: I confirmed what was in my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I confirmed what was in my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: を決して口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I made up my mind and spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made up my mind and spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これ…なんだけど」
理樹@「これのことなんだけど」
ッグタグと機械部品を見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I showed her the dog tag and machine part.
MESSAGE.Translation: I showed her the dog tag and machine part.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…リキ、それは…」
理樹@「ごめん。箱を開けたんだ」
理樹@「クドが、これを捨てるってこと、しちゃいけないような気がして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I had a feeling that they were something you shouldn't be throwing out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I had a feeling that they were something you shouldn't be throwing out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…持っていてはいけないんです」
クド@「それは、私の『きもち』の残骸で…」
クド@「それを持っていてはいけないんです」
クド@「持っている資格もありません…」
ドは静かに答えた。
理樹@「…それは、おかあさんたちのことも」
理樹@「宇宙への夢も、捨てるってことだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And your dreams of going to space... You're throwing them all away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And your dreams of going to space... You're throwing them all away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…はい」
クド@「持っていてはいけないものですから」
理樹@「いけない、なんて誰が決めたの？」
クド@「…私です」
クド@「私が、自分で、決めました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I made my decision on my own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I made my decision on my own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな…クド」
クド@「リキは私に自分で決めろと、言ってくれましたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You told me to decide for myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You told me to decide for myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに、そう言った。
は帰るかどうかの代わりに、そう口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Instead of telling her whether to go back or not, I told her that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead of telling her whether to go back or not, I told her that.

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉は、そのまま返ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast my own words into my teeth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast my own words into my teeth.

MESSAGE.JP: から、言うべき言葉が見つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of that, I didn't know what to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of that, I didn't know what to say.

MESSAGE.JP: っすぐ僕を射抜くクド。
うしてだろう。
ドは目の前にいるのに、遠く感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was right in front of me, but she felt so far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was right in front of me, but she felt so far away.

MESSAGE.JP: んなに近いのに、遠く、遠く距離を隔てているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: We were so close, but it was like we were separated by a great distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were so close, but it was like we were separated by a great distance.

MESSAGE.JP: こにいても想いは通じる……そんな言葉が浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Words floated into my mind... ❛your feelings will get across no matter where you are.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Words floated into my mind... ❛your feelings will get across no matter where you are.❜

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕の目の前にいるクドは、何よりも離れている気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: But Kud, who was right in front of me, felt further away than anything else in the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Kud, who was right in front of me, felt further away than anything else in the world.

MESSAGE.JP: を開こうとした。
を動かそうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to move my legs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to move my legs.

MESSAGE.JP: れどまるで鎖に縛り付けられたかのように、動けない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't move, as if I were wrapped in chains.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't move, as if I were wrapped in chains.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ」
クド@「捨ててください」
クド@「機械部品は…おかあさんのロケット…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The machine part... was from Mother's rocket...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The machine part... was from Mother's rocket...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そのテストモデルの欠片なんです」
めくようにクドは言う。
MESSAGE.EN: The way she spoke resembled moaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: The way she spoke resembled moaning.

MESSAGE.JP: 死で言い訳を考えているような。
MESSAGE.EN: Like she was desperately trying to come up with excuses.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like she was desperately trying to come up with excuses.

MESSAGE.JP: るでうそでもついているかのような、そんな口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The way she was talking made everything sound like a lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: The way she was talking made everything sound like a lie.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の夢を知ったおかあさんが…くれたもので…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Mother knew about my dream... and gave it to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Mother knew about my dream... and gave it to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「夢の…欠片で…わがままな私の…後悔の塊で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A fragment... of my dream... a lump of regrets... that represent my selfishness...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A fragment... of my dream... a lump of regrets... that represent my selfishness...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「だから…それは、私が、持っていちゃいけないもので…」
ドは捨てたい、と言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She was saying she wanted to throw them away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was saying she wanted to throw them away.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが決めたことだ。
はそれを…。
の決断のときみたいに、認めていいのか？
う。違う。違う。
の心の中の声が否定している。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice in my heart refused.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice in my heart refused.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夢を、捨てる…？」
クド@「そうです、もう全部捨てちゃいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. I've already thrown it all away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. I've already thrown it all away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキと一緒に捨てました…」
クド@「だからもういいんです。もう、いいんです」
クド@「もう『それ』は要らないんです」
クド@「お手数ですが…『それ』は捨ててくださいませんか」
理樹@「…よくない」
理樹@「そんなの、よくない」
クド@「り、リキ、でも」
理樹@「捨てたい、なんてうそだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're lying when you say you want to throw them away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're lying when you say you want to throw them away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドはそんなこと願ってない」
クド@「…リキ…」
理樹@「本屋のことだって、そうだよ」
理樹@「クドのしたいことは…夢は、本当に…あのとき語ったことなのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What you want to do... The dream you described; is what you told me in the bookstore what you really want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What you want to do... The dream you described; is what you told me in the bookstore what you really want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはもうすっかり諦めたのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Had she already completely given up?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had she already completely given up?

MESSAGE.JP: う。
棚で足を止めたのは、やっぱりそれが諦められないものだったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Her stopping in front of that bookshelf, she definitely hadn't given up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her stopping in front of that bookshelf, she definitely hadn't given up.

MESSAGE.JP: 厚い本はきっとロケットに関する本で…だから、クドは僕に隠したかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That thick book was about rockets... that's why she wanted to hide it from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That thick book was about rockets... that's why she wanted to hide it from me.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは選んでいなかった。
だ『選んだふり』をしているだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was just pretending she'd decided.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was just pretending she'd decided.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが帰らないこと。
れは家族と会うという選択肢を捨てること。
MESSAGE.EN: That was her throwing away the option of seeing her family.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was her throwing away the option of seeing her family.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが金属片や宇宙に関するものを手放すこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Her letting go of the metal fragment and her things related to space.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her letting go of the metal fragment and her things related to space.

MESSAGE.JP: れは夢や気持ちを捨てること。
MESSAGE.EN: That was her throwing away her dreams and feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was her throwing away her dreams and feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: ―前者を肯定するのに、僕はどうして後者を否定するのか？
MESSAGE.EN: ――I agreed to the former, so why was I refusing the latter?
MESSAGE.Translation: ――I agreed to the former, so why was I refusing the latter?

MESSAGE.JP: を捨てるか、ということだけで僕はクドを認めていたわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: What physical trinkets she threw away was besides the point.
MESSAGE.Translation: What physical trinkets she threw away was besides the point.

MESSAGE.JP: 選択すること』。
択して、向き合うこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Decide and own up to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Decide and own up to it.

MESSAGE.JP: れが強さだ。
たちが得なければならない強さだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's strength that we must obtain.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's strength that we must obtain.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはだから、まだ『選んでいない』。
クド@「…そうですよ。私はわがまま言っちゃだめなんです」
クド@「もっと、こう、私自身にあった夢を…」
クド@「夢を…」
ドの声は力を失っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice lost all its power.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice lost all its power.

MESSAGE.JP: ―だって、夢を諦め切れていないのだから。
MESSAGE.EN: ――After all, she hadn't completely given up on her dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――After all, she hadn't completely given up on her dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 分でも納得できていないのだから。
から、クドはまだ未練を抱えている。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why she couldn't let go.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why she couldn't let go.

MESSAGE.JP: れは選んでいないってことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She hadn't made up her mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hadn't made up her mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…切り捨てただけじゃ、強さじゃない」
葉を絞り出した。
理樹@「切り捨て続けて…その先に、クドの笑顔はあるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you keep leaving things behind... when you are done, will you be able to smile?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you keep leaving things behind... when you are done, will you be able to smile?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは家族を見捨てた、と思ってるみたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You seem to think that you've forsaken your family.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You seem to think that you've forsaken your family.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「家族のひとだって、クドを独りにしてしまった、と悔やんでいるんじゃないだろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But don't you think perhaps your family regrets leaving you by yourself as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But don't you think perhaps your family regrets leaving you by yourself as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「家族も夢も捨てるってことは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When you throw away your family and dreams,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When you throw away your family and dreams,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは独りになることを決意したみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That means you are choosing to be alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That means you are choosing to be alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「繋がりを必要じゃない、と言ってるってことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're saying you don't need those connections.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're saying you don't need those connections.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなの、悲しいじゃないか」
理樹@「だから、捨てないでよ」
理樹@「クドは独りになりたいの？」
理樹@「みんなから離れて独りになりたいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you want to be apart from everyone and all alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you want to be apart from everyone and all alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に、クドはからだを強ばらせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Those words made her stiffen up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those words made her stiffen up.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…それ、は…」
理樹@「クドは、そのままで、笑顔になれるのかな」
クド@「リキ…」
理樹@「独りは辛い。どことも、誰とも繋がってないのは苦しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's hard to be alone. It hurts not being connected to anyone or anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's hard to be alone. It hurts not being connected to anyone or anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度口にすると、想いはどんどん形になっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I spoke, my feelings gradually took shape.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I spoke, my feelings gradually took shape.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「やめてください…」
ドが辛そうに呟く。
れでも僕は続けた。
ドに伝えたかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to get through to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to get through to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは、英語話せないだけで笑われてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were laughed at for not being able to speak English.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were laughed at for not being able to speak English.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いくら日本語が話せても…日本のこと知ってても、周りはそう見てくれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No matter how well you can speak Japanese, or how much you know about Japan, the people around you don't see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No matter how well you can speak Japanese, or how much you know about Japan, the people around you don't see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちが普段当たり前に接しているもの、触れているもの。
MESSAGE.EN: The things we touched and experienced every day.
MESSAGE.Translation: The things we touched and experienced every day.

MESSAGE.JP: れらからクドは繋がっていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud felt no connection to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud felt no connection to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「話してくれたテヴアだって、クドは他の国の言葉を話せないからさみしかったんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You told me about your time in Tevua. Didn't you say you were lonely because you couldn't speak any other languages?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You told me about your time in Tevua. Didn't you say you were lonely because you couldn't speak any other languages?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 郷さえ、クドにとっては居心地がいいものじゃなかったに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in her hometown she felt like an outsider.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in her hometown she felt like an outsider.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ、やめてくだ…」
理樹@「おかあさんから、歯車になれって言葉から、逃げたことを悔いていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You regret running away from your mother for asking you to be a gear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You regret running away from your mother for asking you to be a gear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「期待から逃げて、繋がりを絶ってしまったみたいに考えていたんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You thought that running from those expectations meant you were cutting ties with her, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You thought that running from those expectations meant you were cutting ties with her, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドには、居場所がなかった。
この国でも。
この街でも。
して、家族の期待を裏切ったと考えていたクドにとって。
MESSAGE.EN: And for her, who thought she'd failed to live up to her family's expectations,
MESSAGE.Translation: And for her, who thought she'd failed to live up to her family's expectations,

MESSAGE.JP: 家族ですら、自身の居場所ではないと考えても不思議ではなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: she believed she didn't even have a place amongst her family.
MESSAGE.Translation: she believed she didn't even have a place amongst her family.

MESSAGE.JP: りの『クドリャフカ』。
宙に独り打ち上げられる犬のように、たった独りのクドリャフカ。
MESSAGE.EN: All alone, like the dog that was launched into space.
MESSAGE.Translation: All alone, like the dog that was launched into space.

MESSAGE.JP: りで何かにじっと耐える。
も見えない場所で。
こか知らない場所で。
―たった、独りで。
ドの望みは、救いはそんな場所にしか、ないのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is that the only place where she can fulfill her desires and find her salvation?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that the only place where she can fulfill her desires and find her salvation?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「やめて…リキ…」
クド@「やめて…やめ…」
もそんなクドが、求めたものは結局なんだっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But, in the end, what is it Kud wants?
MESSAGE.Translation: But, in the end, what is it Kud wants?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「繋がりが必要じゃなかったら、どうして僕とおまじないを…あの儀式をしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't need any connections with anyone, then why did I have to say that good-luck charm... why did we do that ritual together?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't need any connections with anyone, then why did I have to say that good-luck charm... why did we do that ritual together?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが帰国しなかった理由は、僕への想いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason she didn't go back was because of her feelings for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason she didn't go back was because of her feelings for me.

MESSAGE.JP: がりも、居場所もないクドが、求めたものは僕だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The thing that Kud, who had no place to belong and no connections, wanted was me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thing that Kud, who had no place to belong and no connections, wanted was me.

MESSAGE.JP: の気持ちを信じて、クドは帰らないことを決めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She trusted my feelings and decided not to go back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She trusted my feelings and decided not to go back.

MESSAGE.JP: う、思う。
―けれど、繋がりはもう要らない、とクドは言う。
MESSAGE.EN: ――But Kud was now saying she didn't want connections anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――But Kud was now saying she didn't want connections anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: れは…。
理樹@「クドは、僕のことも、信じてないの？」
じれば繋がったまま、ということは…。
MESSAGE.EN: If she trusts me, then we are connected.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she trusts me, then we are connected.

MESSAGE.JP: に言えば、信じなければ繋がらないということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Which means we aren't connected if she doesn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: Which means we aren't connected if she doesn't.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ちが、違います…っ！」
ドは首を振る。
理樹@「だったら、僕にこれを捨てさせないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then don't make me throw these out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then don't make me throw these out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のおまじないをした僕がクドの『きもち』を捨てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I had said that good-luck charm to her, but if I throw her feelings away now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had said that good-luck charm to her, but if I throw her feelings away now...

MESSAGE.JP: れは、そのおまじないを無効にでもするかのような…儀式だと、思った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...then it's as if we had never shared that good-luck charm together.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...then it's as if we had never shared that good-luck charm together.

MESSAGE.JP: ―だから、繋がりはもう要らない、とクドは言う。
MESSAGE.EN: ――That's why she was saying she didn't need connections anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――That's why she was saying she didn't need connections anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒に捨ててそれでおしまいなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If we throw these away together, it's over...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If we throw these away together, it's over...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は嫌だ」
んなのは、嫌だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't do something like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't do something like that.

MESSAGE.JP: に断ち切らせて…僕がクドを見捨てるみたいなことさせて。
MESSAGE.EN: Making me sever the connection... it's like making me forsake her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Making me sever the connection... it's like making me forsake her.

MESSAGE.JP: を好きだっていう女の子が例え『望んだ』としても。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if the girl who says she loves me claims that's her ❛desire,❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if the girl who says she loves me claims that's her ❛desire,❜

MESSAGE.JP: れが本当の望み…選択だとは思えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't believe that's her true desire... or decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't believe that's her true desire... or decision.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは選んでない」
クド@「…選んでます」
クド@「ちゃんと、選んでます」
クド@「こうすれば、『きもち』を捨てれば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If I do this... if I throw out my ❛feelings❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If I do this... if I throw out my ❛feelings❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「納得できるって…私、もう、いいって思ったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I thought I could accept it... that I've had enough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I thought I could accept it... that I've had enough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「気持ちは、捨てられるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are feelings something you can throw out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are feelings something you can throw out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「後悔っていう気持ちは、捨てられるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are feelings of regret something you can throw out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are feelings of regret something you can throw out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「後悔する、してるってことは捨てられないってことじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't just throw away your ability to feel regret, can you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't just throw away your ability to feel regret, can you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…後悔する気持ちは捨てられない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You can't throw out your feelings of regret.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You can't throw out your feelings of regret.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それを捨てる、と決めたことは」
理樹@「選んだ、ということじゃないと思う」
クド@「リキ…でも、それは、そんな…」
クド@「どうして…どうして、そんなことを、言うんですか…」
クド@「どうして『いつも』還そうとするんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why are you ❛always❜ trying to give them back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why are you ❛always❜ trying to give them back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「後悔の塊なのに！」
クド@「後悔ばかりしてる私が…だから、未練がましい私がっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I have nothing but regrets... because I'm stubborn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I have nothing but regrets... because I'm stubborn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「捨てたのに…どうして、リキは、私に『いつも』還そうとするんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I threw them out... so why do you keep trying to give them back to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I threw them out... so why do you keep trying to give them back to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって、好きな女の子が、独りでいたい、なんて言うんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because the girl I love is saying she wants to be alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because the girl I love is saying she wants to be alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: を伸ばせばすぐ近くにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: If she reached out, she'd find me right there.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she reached out, she'd find me right there.

MESSAGE.JP: れなのに、クドは離れていこうとしているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, it was like she was trying to pull away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, it was like she was trying to pull away.

MESSAGE.JP: 分に罰を与えるように。
んな必要はない、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think she needs to do that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think she needs to do that.

MESSAGE.JP: しも――。
界に悪意がないのだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If there was no evil in the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: If there was no evil in the world.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが願うままの世界であるのだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was the kind of world Kud wished for.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was the kind of world Kud wished for.

MESSAGE.JP: がクドを罰しようと思うだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Would anyone want to punish her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would anyone want to punish her?

MESSAGE.JP: もそんなこと、望んじゃいないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way anyone would want that.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way anyone would want that.

MESSAGE.JP: っとクド自身だって。
理樹@「僕はこんな近くにいるのに…」
理樹@「届かないところで、独りのままで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it's like you're chained up in a prison,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it's like you're chained up in a prison,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鎖で牢獄に繋ぐみたいなこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All alone, where I can't reach you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All alone, where I can't reach you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「できるわけないよ…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How do I get through to you...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How do I get through to you...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: はなんで、こんなことを…？
MESSAGE.EN: Why did I just say that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did I just say that...?

MESSAGE.JP: れど、それは強いイメージだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was a really strong image.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was a really strong image.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが望もうとしたのは、そんな独りの場所みたいで。
MESSAGE.EN: Like what she wanted was to be alone in a place like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like what she wanted was to be alone in a place like that.

MESSAGE.JP: んな場所に行こうとするなら、僕は手を差し伸べてあげたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: If what she wanted was to go to a place like that, I wanted to offer her my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: If what she wanted was to go to a place like that, I wanted to offer her my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ…」
理樹@「だからこれは捨てちゃだめだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why you can't throw these out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why you can't throw these out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「後悔の塊だと言うのなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You say you have a lump of regrets.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You say you have a lump of regrets.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夢の欠片だと言うのなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You say these are a fragment of your dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You say these are a fragment of your dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「気持ちって、自分から出たものだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Those are feelings that came from within you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Those are feelings that came from within you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドが持っていなくちゃいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why you have to keep them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why you have to keep them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「捨てて忘れちゃいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't throw them out and forget.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't throw them out and forget.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「覚えていなくちゃ」
くても、苦しくても…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it's hard, even if it hurts...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it's hard, even if it hurts...

MESSAGE.JP: たちは忘れちゃいけない。
んなことしかできないんだ、無力な僕たちは。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all helpless people like us can do.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all helpless people like us can do.

MESSAGE.JP: い後悔を抱えて、それでも誰かに手を伸ばし、支えようと想うこころ。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding onto bitter regrets and still maintaining a heart that can offer a hand and support others.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding onto bitter regrets and still maintaining a heart that can offer a hand and support others.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことすら、僕たちにはひどく難しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Doing that sort of thing is terribly difficult for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Doing that sort of thing is terribly difficult for us.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…きもちは…すてられない…」
は手を伸ばす。
ととひとの距離は絶対的に遠い。
MESSAGE.EN: There is no distance further than the one between two people.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is no distance further than the one between two people.

MESSAGE.JP: にいたって。
MESSAGE.EN: Whether they're right next to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whether they're right next to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: を隔てていたって。
れは同じことだ。
たちの心は、きっと遠いままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Our hearts are always far apart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our hearts are always far apart.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、僕は手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I held out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I held out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: を伸ばして、それを繋いでくれるということ。
MESSAGE.EN: I held it out to tell her to take it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held it out to tell her to take it.

MESSAGE.JP: れすらも、当然のことじゃない。
ぐ相手がいなかったクドにとって、それは当たり前じゃなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: For Kud, who had no one she felt connected to, it wasn't natural.
MESSAGE.Translation: For Kud, who had no one she felt connected to, it wasn't natural.

MESSAGE.JP: たり前が、当たり前ではなかったクドに、だから、僕は手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: It's natural, but not for her, so I held out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's natural, but not for her, so I held out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: し伸べられた手。
MESSAGE.EN: I had offered her my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had offered her my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: の手と繋ぐとき、まるで奇跡みたいだって僕は思ったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought it was a miracle when she reached out and took it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought it was a miracle when she reached out and took it.

MESSAGE.JP: りでいた子にとっては、それは本当に奇跡みたいな出来事に違いないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For someone who was all alone, that was truly a miraculous event.
MESSAGE.Translation: For someone who was all alone, that was truly a miraculous event.

MESSAGE.JP: ―それは誰のことだろう――。
は笑ってみせる。
しいことばかりじゃない。
いことはたくさんある。
っぱいある。
しいことばかりじゃない。
しいことはたくさんある。
っぱいある。
意だって世界にはあるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Evil probably does exist out in the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Evil probably does exist out in the world.

MESSAGE.JP: 意だけじゃないかもしれない。
も、なんとか耐えられるのは、繋いだ手の温もりがあったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But we could live through it somehow because we would have the warmth of each other's hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: But we could live through it somehow because we would have the warmth of each other's hands.

MESSAGE.JP: から、僕は手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I held out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I held out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ドにもそれを知って欲しくて、僕の気持ちを伝えたくて、手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted her to know that. I wanted to show her my feelings. So I held out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted her to know that. I wanted to show her my feelings. So I held out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: って、クドはそれが欲しかったんだ。
と同じように、独りだったクドが望んでいたのは、繋ぐ手のひらだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What Kud, who had known the same loneliness I had, wanted was to take that hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: What Kud, who had known the same loneliness I had, wanted was to take that hand.

MESSAGE.JP: きなひととつながっていたい、というただ、それだけの、ねがい。
MESSAGE.EN: To be connected to the one she loved; that was her only wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be connected to the one she loved; that was her only wish.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
ドは拒まなかった。
もなく、壁が壊れたように、温もりが触れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Soundlessly, like a wall had come down, I felt her warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soundlessly, like a wall had come down, I felt her warmth.

MESSAGE.JP: から受け取るクド。
ッグタグと機械部品はクドの手に収まる。
MESSAGE.EN: She held the dog tag and machine part in her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held the dog tag and machine part in her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: れをぎゅっと握りしめてクドが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She gripped them tightly and spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gripped them tightly and spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…捨てたのに」
クド@「やっぱり戻ってきてしまうんですね、これは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They came back to me in the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They came back to me in the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキが、『いつも』手渡してくれるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Because you were ❛always❜ there to give them to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Because you were ❛always❜ there to give them to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私は、受け取るしかない、です」
クド@「私が気持ちを隠して言うのに」
クド@「よわい私が…うそまでついたのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even though I was weak and even lied...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even though I was weak and even lied...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキはいつも私の願うことをしてくれるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You always did what I hoped you would.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You always did what I hoped you would.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「本当に…」
クド@「あなたは、私の、好きなひとなんだなぁって」
クド@「思ってしまったじゃないですか」
クド@「もう手放したくないって」
クド@「私……思ってしまったじゃないですか…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝'...I don't want to let go anymore.'❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝'...I don't want to let go anymore.'❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「黙ってこのまま…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It makes me think... I don't want to part ways with you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It makes me think... I don't want to part ways with you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そう思ったのに…やっぱり」
クド@「やっぱり、離れたくない、って思ってしまったじゃないですか…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...that I would just say nothing and carry on...'❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...that I would just say nothing and carry on...'❞

MESSAGE.JP: き顔のまま笑うクド。
理樹@「みんなのとこへ行こう。それから…」
理樹@「クドの夢の話。クドのおかあさんの話」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll talk about your dreams. Your mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll talk about your dreams. Your mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「英語の話も、外国のおまじないの話もしよう」
ドは泣いたまま笑っていた。
つか『行かなかったこと』を後悔する涙も、止まる日がくるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: A day would probably come when she stops crying over her regret of not going too.
MESSAGE.Translation: A day would probably come when she stops crying over her regret of not going too.

MESSAGE.JP: の日まで、僕はクドと手を繋いで迎えたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to be with her, holding her hand, until that day came.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to be with her, holding her hand, until that day came.

MESSAGE.JP: いても悲しそうでもいいから笑みの混じる毎日を過ごしながら。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if we sometimes cry and feel sad, we will certainly find times to smile too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if we sometimes cry and feel sad, we will certainly find times to smile too.

MESSAGE.JP: んなといる場所が、還ってくる場所だと、僕には思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I believed that the place where everyone was, was the place we could come home to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believed that the place where everyone was, was the place we could come home to.
